Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.view.gui.gui_controllers

Class StageController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.view.gui.gui_controllers.StageController
public abstract class StageController extends Object
Controller that manages the stage by changing scenes.
